title: Capacitive Touch with ATtiny85
tags: capacitive touch, C, C++, attiny85, avr
description: Library that allows pins connected to the ADC to become capacitive touch sensors
content: Why Capacitive Touch?Capacitive touch allows users to interact with devices while reducing mechanical wear. Adding a built-in sensor is done by creating contact points or conductive extentions on a PCB. These contact points and extentions come at virtually no cost.Theory
